text: has anyone found a way to bring HubSpot data into google datastudio for reporting purposes?

Hello <@U6TBZ66FN> I just joined but saw that you have been responding to cache topics.  We're experiencing quite a few instances where updating template, page content, and nav menu do not invalidate the cache.  Here's a screencast of an experiment I did this morning: <https://sg.d.pr/yU5chF> if you can shed some light I'd really appreciate it.
<@U7TAZ6V2Q> Around what time this morning did you record this?
Hmm not seeing anything unusual around that time. <@U6TBZ66FN>?
<@U7TAZ6V2Q> thanks for reporting this issue and the screencast. I will investigate the issue.
<@U6TBZ66FN> That would be awesome.  Thank you!
<@U7TAZ6V2Q> I am able to reproduce this on my page. We will fix this. Thanks.

Fabulous! It's an issue that's made one of our clients pretty anxious. 
(they're a manufacturer and every time they release a new product they like to make a big splash and make all of the assets for that release live at the same time) With the caching issues that's been difficult to actually achieve.

-I work with Gary Wong.
Besides the menu issue, do you have any other specific caching issue? Please let me know.
We have on a regular basis encountered issues when updating css and JS files where after updating it takes what appears to be between 5-20 minutes for the cache on those files is updated.

we don't have a specific file at the moment to point you to in order to reproduce it.

This issue also seems to happen inconsistently, sometimes the files update right away, sometimes not. We will be sure to post a link when we next see this issue.
Did somebody say recently that the language selector and HubSpot Auto detect language now
<@U5C29JW4B> Was doing some work with this

We looked at that but our clients were looking for more customized reporting in GA so the dashboards in databox just couldn't do the complex things we needed from a GA stanspoint. Also found the size of dashboards restricting (they did alot of tables for data comparison)
I believe it was if a user sets the language selector it will remember the selection between visits
